publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1961 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee of the Whole Parliamentâ€”That the Parliament agrees that in accordance with Rule 9.7.1 (b) of the Standing Orders, Stage 2 of the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill be taken in whole by a Committee of the Whole Parliament and directs that any vote to be taken shall be conducted using the electronic voting system. Supported by: Euan Robson*
